name: Trados TagEditor File
summary: Learn about .TTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TTX files are technically referred to as TradosTag files. They can be viewed with Trados TagEditor or from within a web browser with the TRADOStag Viewer plug-in.

description: A TTX file is a translated document generated by Trados translation software. It includes tags that define the text formatting and structure of the page. TTX files can be created from .HTML, .JSP, .ASP, .XSL, .XML, .SGML, .RTF, and .DOC documents, as well as several other file types.
